attributes.action: accept polling in elections only from voters who individually, in a polling station, mark a physical ballot paper which is then publicly and verifiably counted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want no "pregnant chads" or rigged postal ballots in the UK; neither do we want dominant father figures dictating to youths and women who could go to the polling station. THEREFORE THE POSTAL BALLOT FACILITY SHOULD BE WITHDRAWN TO PREVENT ABUSES OF THIS KIND. 
That some disabled or on holiday might be excluded is a small price to pay for total transparency. Look abroad.
